product_name: L'OrealPlump Ambition Hyaluron Lip Oil 24HR Care with Hyaluronic Acid
summary: SummaryGet glass-like shine with L'Or√©al Plump Ambition Hyaluron Lip Oil 24HR Care with Hyaluronic Acid for instantly plumped, smooth lips. Infused with skin-loving ingredients.
details: DetailsFeaturesSet your Plump Ambition higher with L'Oreal Paris new volumizing lip oil with 24HR hydrationVolumizing Glass-like shine in a lightweight, non-stick formulaCushiony Pillow Applicator with Massaging Beads caress lips for luxurious applicationAmbitious lip care one swipe, Available in 10 shadesBenefitsInfused with Hyaluronic Acid and Tripeptides for instantly smoother, plumper-looking lipsItem 2633459How To UseUsing the cushiony pillow applicator, apply starting in the center of your upper lip. Work from the center to outer edges of your lips and then glide across the entire bottom lip. Wait for gentle tingling sensation to subside to assess your glassy, plumper-looking lips!IngredientsC18-36 Acid Triglyceride, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Polybutene, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Diisostearyl Malate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate [Nano] / Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Vanillin, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Menthol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tribehenin, Vanillyl Butyl Ether, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Alumina, Sorbitan Isostearate, Trihydroxystearin, Sodium Saccharin, Mentha Piperita Oil / Peppermint Oil, Silica, Magnesium Silicate, Lactic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Tin Oxide, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Limonene, Glucomannan. May Contain: CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides, CI 15850 / Red 7, Mica, CI 15985 / Yellow 6 Lake, CI 45410 / Red 28 Lake, CI 15850 / Red 6, CI 17200 / Red 33 Lake, CI 45380 / Red 22 Lake, CI 19140 / Yellow 5 Lake, CI 42090 / Blue 1 Lake, CI 75470 / Carmine. (F.I.L. N70057458/1).
how_to_use: Using the cushiony pillow applicator, apply starting in the center of your upper lip. Work from the center to outer edges of your lips and then glide across the entire bottom lip. Wait for gentle tingling sensation to subside to assess your glassy, plumper-looking lips!
ingredients: Silica Dimethyl Silylate [Nano] / Silica Dimethyl Silylate

reviews.headline: love this lip oil
reviews.comments: I finally found a plumping lip oil that I really like without the burning sensation love the cheery red

reviews.headline: Plump lipgloss
reviews.comments: I like this lipgloss but it doesn't last long. You can feel the tingle and the tingle isn't bad but I do wish the color lasted longer. The shade is very nice and it would work with any complexion. I am kinda light/medium and I do like it on me.

reviews.headline: Good lip oil for the price
reviews.comments: I purchased Cherry cherie and wine o clock. Definitely a nice lip oil. Not sticky. But if your looking for a lip stain this is not it.

reviews.headline: Glossy & Hydrated Goodness - Tingling/Color Badness
reviews.comments: I loved the plumping effect and the addition of hyaluronic acid to keep your lips smooth but did not like the color it turned my lips - I understand this is based off of your PH so maybe mine was just not suitable for this gloss..... I also did not enjoy the icy/tingling feeling, I timed it and it took about 5 minutes for the color to reach full potential and then 10 minutes for the icy/tingling sensation to stop. I was gifted this product by L'Or√©al Paris in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.headline: Best lip hydrating lip oil
reviews.comments: Wow just, wow! I picked up the shade Cristal Clear 101, and it goes on completely clear. I love using it as a base before lipstick, lip liner, or lip stain. It keeps my lips hydrated and still works its magic even after the color or shine wears off. I honestly thought it might be a gimmick, but it's actually amazing. The plumping effect is real, you get a pepperminty tingle for about 30 seconds, then it fades. No cons here‚Ä¶ except now I need to try more shades!

reviews.headline: It BURNS!
reviews.comments: No, it's not a tingle. It's painful. Would not recommend. If you really want "plump" lips, just get filler. Probably the same pain level, but for longer-lasting results.

reviews.headline: A good lip oil
reviews.comments: I got this today (shade: "worth it") and I like it! I'm sensitive to smell and taste but this has a pleasant mint/vanilla smell I don't mind. It definitely does plump but not to where it hurts! The color is really pretty, and the smell makes this a new favorite for me. If you don't have a lip oil/lip gloss like this I would say to buy it, but if you have anything similar you definitely don't need to go out of your way for it.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again
reviews.comments: The product was glossy but not plumping as stated.

reviews.headline: I LOVE the unique Pink it gives me!!
reviews.comments: I was gifted this product by L'Or√©al Paris in exchange for my honest review. I was sent this product in the shade pH Cristal Ice. The product came neatly packaged without any damage. I tried the product on and it started to color shift to my unique shade of pink (and I LOVE it) because it matches my skin tone so well. The shine is unbeatable and it isn't sticky (because its a lip oil). I first tried it on 4 hours ago and my lips are still soft. I would highly recommend this!!

reviews.headline: Careful for Allergic Reactions
reviews.comments: I love the color and the formula is so comfortable. The plumping effect was not too bad on but my lips did break out on the top with small little bumps. Be careful if you are sensitive to lip plumpers. This tends to happen to me with the spicy ones. If you arent sensitive then this is honestly so pretty and i love the colors.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again.
reviews.comments: This is a great gloss!

reviews.headline: causes tingling sensation and dries lips
reviews.comments: These cause an uncomfortable tingling sensation on the lips. It does look nice at first and the texture at least feels good, but it leaves my lips very dry.

reviews.headline: Don't Buy if you want a plump lip
reviews.comments: I like the color, it feels nice, not sticky but too shiny for my taste. I prefer more subtle so I don't wear to work, only out with friends. It does not plump, so if that's what you want, try something else. 24HR? No, only feel hydrated when on.

reviews.headline: My new favorite lip gloss
reviews.comments: Leaves the perfect color and not sticky at all, no weird taste or bytning with a nice plumping effect.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: Loved it so much I went and bought more colors ! The  light tingling is a plumper and I noticed a difference right away . Loved the light colors , the smell and the way it made my lips feel !

reviews.headline: Would purchase again
reviews.comments: I paired this lip oil shade 601 WORTH IT with the same lipstick shade and its such a pretty combination. Can wear by its self or pair it with a lip liner/lip stick. Does have a slight stingy sensation and does last for a bit but it's not unbearable. Very smooth and creamy. I have no complaints!

reviews.headline: Shame on Ulta!
reviews.comments: the gloss is good, but they sent me an almost empty bottle. it's disgusting!!! shame on Ulta, the attitude towards customers is terrible

reviews.headline: Less color than expected
reviews.comments: It is too light on the lips

reviews.headline: Pretty and not sticky
reviews.comments: Love this lipgloss!

reviews.headline: Excellent lip oil for the price
reviews.comments: I've never tried a lip oil before so i didnt know what to expect. I love the large, angled doe foot applicator. There is a nice wash of color when you apply it.

media.headline: Cute, but not for dry lips!
I was gifted this product by L'Or√©al Paris & love it

faceoff_positive.comments:
I was recently gifted the L'Or√©al Plump Ambition Hyaluronic Lip Oil, and it has quickly become a staple in my beauty routine! Here's why I love it:  

‚ú® Packaging ‚Äì The sleek and modern design feels luxurious, and the clear tube makes it easy to see how much product is left. Plus, the applicator is perfectly shaped for a smooth and even application.  

üíñ Quality ‚Äì This lip oil delivers on its promises! It's lightweight, non-sticky, and packed with hydrating ingredients like hyaluronic acid that keep my lips feeling soft and nourished for hours.  

üíã Shade ‚Äì The color payoff is gorgeous! Whether you choose a sheer tint or a deeper hue, the shades are flattering and enhance your natural lip color with a beautiful glossy finish.  

‚úî Convenience of Use ‚Äì It's effortless to apply on the go. The formula glides on smoothly, providing instant hydration and shine without feeling heavy or greasy. Perfect for a quick touch-up!  

üåü Overall Experience ‚Äì This lip oil is a game-changer! It combines the best of hydration and shine, leaving my lips looking fuller and feeling ultra-moisturized. Whether worn alone or over lipstick, it adds the perfect glossy touch.  

If you're looking for a lip oil that delivers hydration, shine, and comfort, the L'Or√©al Plump Ambition Hyaluronic Lip Oil is a must-try! üíÑ‚ú®
faceoff_positive.headline: A Must-Have for Hydrated, Glossy Lips!

faceoff_negative.comments: Starting with the bottle, I love the shape of it, the feel of the packing and the aesthetic. It looks luxurious and fits nicely in a small purse. The applicator is soft and applies evenly. The lip oil itself is shiny and soft but it does have a plumping effect. I live in an area that is pretty cold at the moment so I often have dry lips this time of year. This meant the lip oil burned quite a lot, honestly a bit too much for my comfort. I'd be interested to use this in the summer when my lips are more hydrated. The color of the lip oil I got is really nice (in the shade Cristal clear) so it looks very natural. If your lips are chapped or it's really cold where you live, this may not be the best gloss for you in the winter. I was gifted this product by L'Or√©al Paris in exchange for an honest review.
faceoff_negative.headline: Cute, but not for dry lips!
